attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like steve mclaren to be sacked from the england football managers job, because i feel personaly that the man has let me down on many ocasions and not fulfilled the expactations as a dedicated english football supporter that i expected. i would like steve mclaren sacked from his position as the football manager of our great nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
